metaTags.metaDescription: Learn about the wide range of participants in Project Galileo, which supports organizations working in the arts, human rights, civil society, journalism, and democracy.

relatedBlades.title: Project Galileo case studies
relatedBlades.copy: Learn about the wide range of participants in [Project Galileo](https://www.cloudflare.com/galileo/), a program that protects vulnerable organizations working in the arts, human rights, journalism, and democracy.

relatedBlades.title: The Greenpeace Canada Education Fund
relatedBlades.copy: GCEF informs the public through research and campaigns focused on climate change, biodiversity, and environmental justice in Canada.

relatedBlades.title: Immigrant Legal Resource Center
relatedBlades.copy: ILRC advances immigrant rights by offering legal training, advocacy, and resources for community-based organizations.

relatedBlades.title: Youth Initiative for Human Rights
relatedBlades.copy: This regional network empowers young people to promote human rights and reconciliation across post-conflict Balkan societies.

relatedBlades.title: Celebrating Project Galileo's 11th anniversary with new case studies
VoteAmerica
relatedBlades.copy: VoteAmerica has a simple yet ambitious goal: mobilize record-breaking voter turnout in the United States. Learn how Project Galileo helps them protect voter data and prepare for traffic surges.

relatedBlades.title: UN Women Australia
relatedBlades.copy: After fraudulent transaction attempts from attackers disrupted fundraising efforts, UN Women Australia switched to a payment gateway that offered better security and worked to future-proof their site.

relatedBlades.title: Organization for Transformative Works
relatedBlades.copy: After getting hit by headline-making attacks, the Organization for Transformative Works' volunteers sprang into action to get back online and improve their defenses.

relatedBlades.title: Awaq ONGD
relatedBlades.copy: As part of Awaq ONGD's core mission of fighting climate change, they are collecting a great deal of environmental data and require strategies to ensure reliable and secure access for scientists.

relatedBlades.title: Tech4Peace
relatedBlades.copy: Tech4Peace, which aims to stop the spread of false information in Iraq, has faced resistance and digital threats over the years, with the risks escalating since the country's October Revolution in 2019.

features.title: Valdosta Amateur Radio Club
features.description: The VARC's radio enthusiasts promote the use of amateur radio as a means of emergency preparedness, and they serve parts of Georgia and Florida with critical communication during emergencies, including extreme weather.

features.title: British Beekeepers Association
features.description: The British Beekeepers Association is a charity that represents 25,000 hobbyist beekeepers and aims to raise standards in beekeeping. Founded in 1874, the group is known for their educational programs, lectures, and workshops.

features.title: Cultural Organization [Anonymous]
features.description: This century-old nonprofit provides cultural education and events, with much of it available for free online. While carrying out its mission to inspire and educate, however, its team has faced security threats from internal and external sources.

relatedBlades.title: Muzeon
relatedBlades.copy: After DDoS attacks interfered with the Muzeon Association's ability to share stories about the history of a Jewish community in Romania, they requested help from Project Galileo.

features.title: Veterans Brotherhood
features.description: The Veterans Brotherhood is an organization designed to prevent veteran suicides through helping veterans with PTSD.

features.title: Sin Embargo
features.description: Sin Embargo is a digital newspaper serving readers investigative journalism throughout Mexico.

features.title: Musopen
features.description: Musopen provides recordings, sheet music, and textbooks to the public for free, without copyright restrictions.

features.title: Internet Archive
features.description: Information is powerful. The Internet Archive believes that sharing it will provide for a more innovative, more equal future.

features.title: Cagle
features.description: Editorial cartoonists are like canaries in the press freedom coal mine.

features.title: Bedayaa
features.description: The biggest threat to Bedayaa is tracking and censorship by the government.

relatedBlades.title: Dream Girl Foundation
relatedBlades.copy: Securing data and fending off attacks are critical to Dream Girl Foundation's ability to thrive — learn how they protect their website with Project Galileo.

features.title: The Trevor Project
features.description: The mission of The Trevor Project is to provide powerful support and end suicide among gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, and questioning young people.

features.title: Decision Desk HQ
features.description: When DDHQ was named by Twitter one of the seven outlets in the world as an authoritative figure in declaring election results, we had to increase our ongoing efforts to ensure that our site was safe and available for those looking for accurate election results.

features.title: Electionland
features.description: Electionland has been described as the largest single-day collaborative journalistic effort ever made. Over 800 journalists participated in fact-checking news gathered from social discovery services and media aggregations.

features.title: Diario de Araxa
features.description: Diário de Araxá is a newspaper in southern Brazil that seeks to share unbiased information, which is a challenge in a country where journalism is frequently attacked and censored.

features.title: Lake County News
features.description: Lake County News is an award-winning news agency that covers local government, schools, community groups, and environmental affairs in their northern California county.

features.title: Raissa Robles
features.description: Raissa Robles' challenge: Publishing controversial stories without being taken offline.

relatedBlades.title: HERA Digital Health
relatedBlades.copy: To help further their mission to connect refugee populations with healthcare services, HERA relies on Cloudflare for DNS, CDN, Load Balancing, and API security.

features.title: Women's March Global
features.description: Women's March Global seeks to empower women to advance women's rights in their local communities and unite grassroots movements worldwide.

features.title: GMRF
features.description: Since 1997, the Global Medical Relief Fund has provided children with vital medical care around the world.

features.title: US Vote Foundation
features.description: "It is difficult to know how to secure your website for the unexpected, and Project Galileo gave us the ability to focus on our work in providing authoritative information to voters to participate in their democracy."

features.title: BullyingCanada
features.description: BullyingCanada works to provide direct services to youths and their families to help them resolve bullying situations.

features.title: Majal
features.description: Majal is a nonprofit dedicated to amplifying underrepresented voices and promoting social justice, particularly in the Middle East.

features.title: VOST Portugal
features.description: Learn how VOST Portugal managed an influx of traffic during the recent fuel crisis with the help of Project Galileo.

features.title: Polish Scouting and Guiding Association (ZHP)
features.description: This century-old organization provides educational and leadership training programs for young people and organizes COVID and refugee assistance.

features.title: Sheltersuit
features.description: After joining Project Galileo, Sheltersuit achieved a 26% improvement in page load times to support fundraising efforts.

features.title: Better World Ed
features.description: According to Executive Director Abhi Nangia, "Project Galileo enables us to up our security efforts in a way that keeps us sleeping peacefully, trusting our website is in good security hands."

features.title: Interfaith Enlightenment Center
features.description: The Interfaith Enlightenment Center was started in 2011 with a mission to provide aid to people in marginalized communities worldwide.

features.title: Reporter Taiwan
features.description: The Reporter is a nonprofit media organization striving to produce in-depth reports, conduct investigative journalism, and track important issues.

features.title: WUSC
features.description: WUSC looks to improve education, economics, and opportunities to overcome inequality and exclusion in over 25 countries.

features.title: Sarawak Report
features.description: Sarawak Report is a publishing platform covering issues such as land grabs, corruption, and cronyism in Malaysia and beyond.

relatedBlades.title: Coalition for the Protection of Greyhounds
relatedBlades.copy: The Coalition for the Protection of Greyhounds turned to Cloudflare to improve their site speed and defend against attacks that could bring down their site.

relatedBlades.title: Ukrainians in the Netherlands Foundation
relatedBlades.copy: Ukrainians in the Netherlands Foundation provides humanitarian aid to Ukraine and supports displaced people arriving in the Netherlands, including mental health support and translation help.

relatedBlades.title: Learn about Cloudflare products and tools
